item.description:
Please join us for the first of a series of cheese making events! This will be a hands on workshop led by our talented foodie- Tory. Herbal Iris has generously offered her kitchen for this gathering. We will be making a raw milk mozzarella that will be ready to eat later the same day!

The loose agenda:
Noon- meet and greet at Iris's kitchen
12:15- Discussion about the materials and methods and start making cheese
4:00- Wrap up and take home the cheese

Please bring a light snack or beverage to share with the group.

There will be a fee for this workshop based on the cost of ingredients and materials. Exact fee will be posted well before the date. We will be using Raw milk so if this is an issue for you please consider a different event.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the door and someone will let you in.
item.name: Cheese Making 101
